Message: The user completes the submission of the form
how can i add users to the account management

Hey Cody! To add users to your account management, follow these steps:
1. Access Account Management.
2. Switch over to the 'Ad Accounts' tab.
3. Click ‘Access’ under your preferred Ad account.
4. Select ‘Add User’ on the right-hand side of your screen.
5. Fill in the email address of the new user and their Ad account role (Admin, Operator, or Viewer) and submit.
The new user will receive an email with a link to verify their email address. Once verified, they will see your Ad account listed under their own Account Management tab.
For more details, you can check out this guide: [Account Management Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17539290349709-Account-Management-Guide).
